question: {name} is selling {food}s and {fruit} pies for a fundraiser. On {d1}, he sold {n1} boxes of {food} and {m1} fewer boxes of {fruit} pie, than on {d2}. On {d2}, he sold {n2} more boxes of {food}s than on {d1} and {m2} boxes of {fruit} pie. On {d3}, he sold as much as he did in the past two days combined. If the {food} cost {cur}{cn} and the {fruit} pie cost {cur}{cm}, what was {name}'s average daily earning?
